医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员确定了对第 2 组先天淋巴细胞成熟至关重要的分子过程科学家们发现了ILC2免疫细胞发育的一种新机制，该机制可能与过敏性疾病的加剧有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-molecular-processes-crucial-for-the-maturation-of-Group-2-innate-lymphoid-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-molecular-processes-crucial-for-the-maturation-of-Group-2-innate-lymphoid-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c69cd91f-5415-4e1b-b2d0-ed5ca998cde3 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 14:20:32 -0400 Researchers identify molecular processes crucial for the maturation of Group 2 innate lymphoid cells
肝脏肿瘤独有的一组小分子可能是开发癌症疫苗的关键由德尔马医院研究所、纳瓦拉西玛大学和庞培法布拉大学领导的一项研究发现了一组肝脏肿瘤独有的小分子，它们可能是开发癌症疫苗的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Group-of-small-molecules-exclusive-to-liver-tumors-could-be-key-to-developmenting-cancer-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Group-of-small-molecules-exclusive-to-liver-tumors-could-be-key-to-developmenting-cancer-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e488a94d-41ff-42f7-ac2c-ef3f9c52cabf Thu, 11 Jul 2024 14:13:49 -0400 Group of small molecules exclusive to liver tumors could be key to developing cancer vaccines
“无底洞”：自付费用如何让患者负债三十多年来，乔娜·塔兰特（Jonna Tallant）经历了持续不断的疼痛，尝试了每一种颞下颌关节治疗方法：护齿套、六套牙套、牙冠和矫治器、药物、物理治疗、肉毒杆菌、按摩、针灸、脊椎按摩治疗和手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/e28098A-bottomless-pite28099-How-out-of-pocket-TMJ-costs-drive-患者-into-debt.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/e28098A-bottomless-pite28099-How-out-of-pocket-TMJ-costs-drive-患者-into-debt.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=499381e8-a748-49f8-9e31-936e62000715 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 13:49:55 -0400 ‘A bottomless pit’: How out-of-pocket TMJ costs drive patients into debt
创新的 aiTBS 疗法缩短了双相情感障碍的治疗时间在一项使用加速间歇 theta 爆发刺激 (aiTBS) 的随机临床试验之后，出现了一种可显着缩短治疗时间的双相情感障碍 (BP) 潜在新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Innovative-aiTBS-therapy-shortens-treatment-duration-for-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Innovative-aiTBS-therapy-shortens-treatment-duration-for-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1fb0b57-3e40-4b80-b200-c4b87948374e Thu, 11 Jul 2024 13:38:37 -0400 Innovative aiTBS therapy shortens treatment duration for bipolar disorder
对于帕金森病患者来说，LSVT LOUD 的效果优于 NHS 言语和语言治疗今天发表在《英国医学杂志》上的一项试验发现，美国开发的一种名为 Lee Silverman 语音治疗 (LSVT LOUD) 的强化语音治疗方法比传统 NHS 语音和语言治疗或不治疗帕金森病患者更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/LSVT-LOUD-outperforms-NHS-speech-and-language-therapy-for-people-with-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/LSVT-LOUD-outperforms-NHS-speech-and-language-therapy-for-people-with-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ac561bf-c785-44f2-95c4-11dade32de49 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 13:30:16 -0400 LSVT LOUD outperforms NHS speech and language therapy for people with Parkinson's disease
研究人员发现大脑小区域中延迟进食开始的神经元你会拿起叉子吃第一口蛋糕，还是说不然后走开？我们的进食动机是由大脑中复杂的细胞网络驱动的，这些细胞使用来自体内的信号以及我们面前食物的感官信息来确定我们的行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-neurons-in-a-small-brain-region-that-delay-feeding-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-neurons-in-a-small-brain-region-that-delay-feeding-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce98d1f2-b6e9-4442-a081-080564005a6d Thu, 11 Jul 2024 13:25:23 -0400 Researchers identify neurons in a small brain region that delay feeding initiation
研究人员确定了两个表明侵袭性前列腺癌风险较高的风险因素最近的一项欧洲泌尿肿瘤学研究根据格里森评分和临床参数评估了前列腺癌患者的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-two-risk-factors-that-indicate-higher-risk-of-aggressive-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-two-risk-factors-that-indicate-higher-risk-of-aggressive-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47412bc9-7e46-47f4-8730-68db5a3bfc7a Thu, 11 Jul 2024 08:31:00 -0400 Researchers identify two risk factors that indicate higher risk of aggressive prostate cancer

补充山茱萸对不同心脏代谢结果的影响《营养》杂志最近的一项荟萃​​分析检查了最近对山茱萸（Cornus mas L.）的研究，以寻找其心脏代谢益处的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/The-effect-of-supplementation-with-cornelian-cherry-on- Different-cardiometabolic-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/The-effect-of-supplementation-with-cornelian-cherry-on- Different-cardiometabolic-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ec360a5-e1b5-4289-871b-faa80fa3cd50 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 08:06:00 -0400 The effect of supplementation with cornelian cherry on different cardiometabolic outcomes
儿童自闭症谱系障碍的古菌、真菌、病毒以及细菌、功能制造者研究人员通过对儿童粪便样本进行宏基因组测序，研究了多界肠道微生物组成分和功能标记与自闭症谱系障碍之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Archaeal-fungal-viral-as-well-as-bacterial-function-makers-for-autism-spectrum-disorder-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Archaeal-fungal-viral-as-well-as-bacterial-function-makers-for-autism-spectrum-disorder-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31479ba8-dc7f-4a87-bc8a-5bc2ef8bec45 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:46:00 -0400 Archaeal, fungal, viral, as well as bacterial, functional makers for autism spectrum disorder in children
